verses.verse: And it came to pass in the <S%H259>eleventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H259>month<s%>, in the first day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and to his <S%H1995>multitude<s%>: Whom art thou <S%H1819>like<s%> in thy <S%H1433>greatness<s%>?

Behold <S%H804><s%>, the Assyrian was a <S%H730>cedar<s%> in <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> with <S%H3303>fair<s%> <S%H6057>branches<s%>, and with a <S%H6751>forest-like<s%> <S%H2793>shade<s%>, and of <S%H1362>high<s%> <S%H6967>stature<s%>; and its <S%H6788>top<s%> was among the thick <S%H5688>boughs<s%>.

The <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1431>nourished<s%> <S%H8415>it<s%>, the deep made it to <S%H7311>grow<s%>: the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> thereof <S%H1980>ran<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> its <S%H4302>plantation<s%>; and it sent <S%H7971>out<s%> its <S%H8585>channels<s%> unto all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>.

Therefore its <S%H6967>stature<s%> was <S%H1361>exalted<s%> above all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>; and its <S%H5634>boughs<s%> were <S%H7235>multiplied<s%>, and its <S%H6288>branches<s%> became <S%H748>long<s%> by reason of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>, when it shot them <S%H7971>forth<s%>.

All the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> made their <S%H7077>nests<s%> in its <S%H5589>boughs<s%>; and under its <S%H6288>branches<s%> did all the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> bring forth their <S%H3205>young<s%>; and under its <S%H6738>shadow<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> all <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%>.
Thus was it <S%H3302>fair<s%> in its <S%H1433>greatness<s%>, in the <S%H753>length<s%> of its <S%H1808>branches<s%>; for its <S%H8328>root<s%> was by <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>.

The <S%H730>cedars<s%> in the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> could not <S%H6004>hide<s%> <S%H1265>it<s%>; the fir-trees were not <S%H1819>like<s%> its <S%H5589>boughs<s%>, and the <S%H6196>plane-trees<s%> were not as its <S%H6288>branches<s%>; nor was any <S%H6086>tree<s%> in the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1819>like<s%> unto it in its <S%H3308>beauty<s%>.

I <S%H6213>made<s%> it <S%H3303>fair<s%> by the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of its <S%H1808>branches<s%>, so that all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%>, that were in the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, envied <S%H7065>it<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: Because thou art <S%H1361>exalted<s%> in <S%H6967>stature<s%>, and he hath <S%H5414>set<s%> his <S%H6788>top<s%> among the thick <S%H5688>boughs<s%>, and his <S%H3824>heart<s%> is lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> in his <S%H1363>height<s%>;

I will even <S%H5414>deliver<s%> him into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the mighty <S%H410>one<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>; he shall <S%H6213>surely<s%> <S%H6213>deal<s%> with <S%H1644>him<s%>; I have driven him out for his <S%H7562>wickedness<s%>.

And <S%H2114>strangers<s%>, the <S%H6184>terrible<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, have cut him <S%H3772>off<s%>, and have <S%H5203>left<s%> <S%H2022>him<s%>: upon the mountains and in all the <S%H1516>valleys<s%> his <S%H1808>branches<s%> are <S%H5307>fallen<s%>, and his <S%H6288>boughs<s%> are <S%H7665>broken<s%> by all the <S%H650>watercourses<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>; and all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> are gone <S%H3381>down<s%> from his <S%H6738>shadow<s%>, and have left <S%H5203>him<s%>.

Upon his <S%H4658>ruin<s%> all the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%>, and all the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall be upon his <S%H6288>branches<s%>;

to the end that none of all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> by the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1361>exalt<s%> themselves in their <S%H6967>stature<s%>, neither <S%H5414>set<s%> their <S%H6788>top<s%> among the thick <S%H5688>boughs<s%>, nor that their mighty <S%H352>ones<s%> stand <S%H5975>up<s%> on their <S%H1363>height<s%>, even all that <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>: for they are all <S%H5414>delivered<s%> unto <S%H4194>death<s%>, to the nether <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>, with them that go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: In the <S%H3117>day<s%> when he went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> I caused a <S%H56>mourning<s%>: I <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H8415>deep<s%> for <S%H4513>him<s%>, and I restrained the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> <S%H7227>thereof<s%>; and the great <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H3607>stayed<s%>; and I caused <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> to <S%H6937>mourn<s%> for <S%H6086>him<s%>, and all the trees of the <S%H7704>field<s%> fainted for <S%H5969>him<s%>.

I made the <S%H1471>nations<s%> to <S%H7493>shake<s%> at the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of his <S%H4658>fall<s%>, when I cast him <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> with them that <S%H3381>descend<s%> into the <S%H953>pit<s%>; and all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%>, the <S%H4005>choice<s%> and <S%H2896>best<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, all that <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>, were <S%H5162>comforted<s%> in the nether <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

They also went <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> with him unto them that are <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; <S%H2220>yea<s%>, they that were his arm, that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> under his <S%H6738>shadow<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

To whom art thou thus <S%H1819>like<s%> in <S%H3519>glory<s%> and in <S%H1433>greatness<s%> among the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%>? yet shalt thou be brought <S%H3381>down<s%> with the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%> unto the nether <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: thou shalt <S%H7901>lie<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%>, with them that are <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>. This is <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and all his <S%H1995>multitude<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.
